ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me just put this quote from a board msg... From what I can tell this does absolutly nothing. I think the game designers put this in the game so people
ygData.messageBody:
Let me just put this quote from a board msg...
"<br>From what I can tell this does absolutly nothing. I
think the game designers put this in the game so people
would post messages on message boards asking what it
does, and then laugh at the wild and kooky answers
given in replies."<br><br>I find this to be fairly apt
so far. It probably does do SOMETHING... but
whatever it is-- it's hard to figure out and how to do it.
There's references to possible Smithing recipes as Forges
got increased in slots a while back. <br><br>There's
also references to quests and something called a
Gemcutter's bag that gets created when you combine the
Gemcutter in someway (some say by itself in a toolbox-- but
I have no way of verifying this-- many things are
just speculations).<br><br>If you find out anything...
plz post it and let us know. I've spent several hours
and still finding nothing on this. Many references.
Ah well... <br><br>shooman out... FatedHue of the
Drinal Server.
